item.title: Ethernaut - Level 06 - Delegation
item.description: // SPDX-License-Identifier: MIT pragma solidity ^0.6.0; contract Delegate { address public owner; constructor(address _owner) public { owner = _owner; } function pwn() public { owner = msg.sender; } } contract Delegation { address public owner; Delegate delegate; constructor(address _delegateAddress) public { delegate = Delegate(_delegateAddress); owner = msg.sender; } fallback() external { (bool result,) = address(delegate).delegatecall(msg.data); if (result) { this; } } } FIGURE 1 – Contract’s source code Where is the vulnerability?
